doc.field: RATES NOMURA INTERNATIONAL PLC BONDS AAA

- Standard and Poor's Corp said it assigned a preliminary AAA rating to 150 mln dlrs of 7-1/4 pct guaranteed subordinated bonds due 1992 of Nomura International Finance PLC, the U.K. unit of Nomura Securities Co Ltd. S and P cited the guarantee, which is a senior obligation of the parent company, the largest of the Big Four securities houses in Japan. The rating agency noted that Nomura Securities has by far the largest capital base in nominal terms of any securities firm in the world and is conservatively leveraged.
